content: For anyone from the profiling tools presentation, Ewout has published the Windows validators with both DSTU2 and STU3 versions available here: https://github.com/ewoutkramer/Furore.Fhir.ValidationDemo/releases

And the Fhirpath Tester app that I demo'd can be found here:
https://github.com/brianpos/fhirpathtester/releases
